ingredients.item: 2 x 500g packs plum tomatoes, roughly chopped

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large saucepan and fry the onion for 3-4 minutes. Add the paprika and then the tomatoes, cover and cook for a further 5 minutes.
Add the stock, cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Stir in the milk and soft cheese then purée with a hand-held stick blender until smooth.
